title: "Why Computers Don’t Need to Match Human Intelligence"
excerpt: "Speech and language are central to human intelligence, communication, and cognitive processes. Understanding natural language is often viewed as the greatest AI challenge—one that, if solved, could take machines much closer to human intelligence."
